jhyuxm1912562461624131982.content: “Thinking with Images” has been one of our core bets in Perception since the earliest o-series launch. We quietly shipped o1 vision as a glimpse—and now o3 and o4-mini bring it to life with real polish. Huge shoutout to our amazing team members, especially: -
jhyuxm1912562461624131982.author: jhyuxm
